author: elecharny
msg: o Changed the search API to return an EntryCursor instead of a Cursor<Response>, for simple searches

author: norman
msg: Fix a race-condition which could lead to problems when a mail content is shared because it is queued multiple times. See JAMES-1240

author: pamarcelot
msg: Added shutdown() method to the LdapCodecService interface to avoid importing the 'org.apache.directory.shared.ldap.codec.standalone.StandaloneLdapCodecService' class which breaks OSGI (and Studio) compatibility.
